attributes.action: release the contents of a D-Notice, issued in March 1989, against a BBC "Newsnight" programme on the clandestine activities and death of Hugh John Simmonds CBE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
This information ought to be dealt with under the Freedom of Information Act.
http://www.number10.gov.uk/output/Page7035.asp
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
